titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide for duty free treatment on certain manufacturing equipment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/25/2000--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to grant duty-free treatment to certain machines used in the manufacture of radial tires designed for off-the-highway use and with a rim measuring 63.5cm (currently, 86cm) or more in diameter through December 31, 2001.
